name: Coach
text: How on earth did you get here?

name: Coach
text: Well regardless, we got to head to the course right now. Your tee time is coming up soon.

name: Coach
text: You have your disc launcher right?

name: Coach
text: Don't tell me you lost your disc launcher!

name: Wade
text: Okay uh...I didn't lose my disc launcher

name: Coach
text: Man don't scare me like that!

name: Coach
text: Anyway, I'll meet you at the course, you can borrow my golf cart. I need the exercise anyway

name: Coach
text: Head north from the gym and you should see a big giant mansion by the beach. We're hosting the disc golf tourney there.

name: Mysterious Voice
text: Go look for your disc golf launcher before coach finds out
